wikipedia_page.main: Adam James Ball (born 1 March 1993) is an English cricketer who plays for Suffolk County Cricket Club. Ball is a batting allrounder who played top level cricket for Kent County Cricket Club from 2010 until 2017 and was captain of the England Under-19 cricket team.

The squad for 2011 featured a number of young players, including Adam Ball, Sam Billings, Daniel Bell-Drummond, Adam Riley and Ashley Shaw, who all made their first-class debuts during the season.

Adam Ball, Hugh Bernard and Charlie Hartley were released by Kent at the end of the 2017 season.Hoad A (2017) Kent all-rounder Adam Ball and seamer Hugh Bernard set for move away from club, Kent Online, 2017-08-29. Retrieved 2017-09-29.Charlie Hartley to leave Kent, Kent County Cricket Club, 2017-09-29. Retrieved 2017-10-02. Matt Coles also left his home county to join county champions Essex in October 2017.Matt Coles joins County Champions Essex from Kent on a two-year deal, Sky Sports, 2017-10-28. Retrieved 2017-10-30.
